name: David Burhans
title: Full-Stack Polyglot Software Engineer
objective: To find an environment that will foster my excitement about technology and expose me to similarly excited people. In doing so, I hope to be immersed in a culture of learning and sharing. I want to turn ideas into software as efficiently as possible.

experience.title: Senior Systems Engineer
experience.description: Worked on next-generation cloud application suite, CloudLink. Continued to mondernize ShoreTel product's scalability and CI/CD processes.

projects.name: Google AI
projects.description: Created microservice to interact with Google's Contact Center AI that can be shared between the company's three major call center projects. Project was demonstrated at Google Next 2018.

projects.name: MiCloud Connect Contact Center
projects.description: Continued to support efforts to improve CI/CD and scalability. Added facilities to allow automatic distributed service discovery for scalable components.

experience.title: Associate Staff Software Engineer
experience.description: Assisted in migrating a large, legacy, monolithic Windows C++ software suite to a containerized, cloud-capable Linux infrastructure.

projects.name: Connect Cloud Contact Center
projects.description: Converted large Win32 C++ code-base to Linux using Wine. Containerized system. Solved technical scalability issues caused by original architecture and design

experience.title: Software Engineer IV
experience.description: Acted as a technical R&D lead to help design and create next-generation contact-center-as-a-service.

projects.name: Wallace.io
projects.description: Maintained and extended a real-time Pusher.com-like API service. Made changes so application could be containerized, distributed, run, and auto-discover other nodes on an in-house cloud.

projects.name: Chicken-Run
projects.description: Designed and built declarative, distributed stream processing library able to re-use with Django-based utilites for a contact-center-as-a-service API to run on an in-house cloud.

projects.name: Pseudo-Real-Time event servers
projects.description: Used Chicken-Run to create TCP socket and websocket server to serve real-time-ish events through a flexible JSONPath subscription mechanism. Was later leverage to provide push events for third-party integration.

experience.title: Software Engineer IV
experience.description: Performed critical maintenance and infrastructure-related updates. Fixed Internet Explorer incompatibilities. Hardened site security for banking audits. Helped streamline production release workflow.

projects.name: Security Audit
projects.description: Analyzed our site before the security audit to plug any existing security issues. Resolved all issues that arose during the audit.

projects.name: IE Ajax
projects.description: Replaced entire IE-only AJAX tool-set with a custom tool-set that used the same interface but was cross-browser compatible. Fixed issues on hundreds of pages by doing this.

projects.name: IE Xml Data Islands
projects.description: This is another IE-only technology that assisted with doing complex XML manipulation on the client. Implemented an interface that would execute the XML manipulations on the server, if necessary, or modified the page to not use XML.

projects.name: Critical Maintenance
projects.description: 'It doesn't matter what it is, I know I can give it to you and it will be taken care of.' from performance review.

experience.title: Development Lead
experience.description: Led team to redesign core business software on a tight deadline. Primary goals of the redesign were: stability, scalability, maintainability, and SalesForce integration. Standardized, then automated, entire release workflow using Jira, Git, and Bamboo to accommodate rapidly changing business needs.

projects.name: SalesForce Integration
projects.description: Two-way data integration. Automatically move leads through SalesForce process in response to actions taken in the application.

projects.name: Pricing Engine
projects.description: One of the reasons of the re-design was that the pricing algorithms changed so often and were not centralized. To fix this, we centralized and versioned all pricing algorithms.

projects.name: Continuous Integration
projects.description: Created automated build and release process to streamline the deployment of the application. Saved the team over ten hours a week.

experience.title: Software Contractor
experience.description: Used .Net WebForms and WinForms for real-time monitoring and updating of consumer-facing kiosks via WCF web services.

projects.name: Remote Kiosk Update
projects.description: Six-month contract to improve the provisioning and upgrading of consumer kiosks (Windows CE) which may be deployed anywhere in the world and have infrequent internet access.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Used agile principles to expand and improve a cutting-edge high-volume, high-availability web site with real-time updates. Integrated at durable, distributed, and asynchronous inter-process communication system into the existing architecture. Built automatic configuration and deployment solutions for said system.

projects.name: US Bank Integration
projects.description: Implemented just-in-time ordering of personalized US Bank Gift Cards in order to make company's inventory more lean.

projects.name: Service Bus
projects.description: Implemented NServiceBus to facilitate real-time communication between our application servers and our web socket servers. Used to notify users of issues before they spent money.

experience.title: Software Engineer/Software Architect
experience.description: Designed and developed varied applications using C++, Delphi, and .Net. Extensive use of SQL in both development and optimization. Developed a reusable web service to allow communications from our flagship Document Management System to a remote database and file server over SSL.

projects.name: SawDust Investment Aggregator
projects.description: Hooked into Exchange to scrape investment emails for raw investment data. Created a user-friendly UI to allow end-users to configure new rules for email scraping depending on custom filters and view aggregated investment data.

projects.name: Collybus Document Management System
projects.description: Created the second generation of company's flagship DMS. Implemented pluggable architecture in order to reduce code duplication and decrease development time. Lead architect on third generation.

projects.name: Document Imaging
projects.description: Maintained and improved core document import utility for Collybus. Leveraged Collybus's new pluggable architecture to create more cohesion between products. Required knowledge of desktop scanning, check scanning, bulk processing and indexing of documents.

projects.name: Email Archiver
projects.description: Hooked directly into Exchange to gather, index, and store all emails coming for retention purposes. Integrated directly into our DMS with an email specific UI placed on top.

projects.name: Digital Voice Recorder
projects.description: Created a tool for StateFarm Insurance to add audio recording support to Collybus. Once captured, the audio was compressed using the Speex codec, indexed, and stored for future searching and retrieval.

projects.name: Kemper Inbox
projects.description: Created a software package based on Collybus that allowed Kemper (Unitrin) Insurance to eliminate all incoming mail. Instead the mail was routed to our data center, scanned, indexed, imported into Collybus, and then routed to the appropriate recipient according to customized routing rules.

projects.name: Ziegler A2Z
projects.description: Created web site to track and aggregate financial statistics of senior living facilities around the country.

projects.name: Encompass Education
projects.description: Helped implement a generic examination framework for national scholastic testing on top of Collybus.

projects.name: Badger Mutual Insurance
projects.description: Software consultant

projects.description: Software consultant

projects.name: Tower Credit Union
projects.description: Software consultant

projects.name: Action Express
projects.description: Software consultant

experience.title: Software Engineering, B.S.; Mathematics, Minor
experience.description: Advanced knowledge of C++ and Motorola embedded systems assembly. Educated in software design and architecture. Real world experience working for the state of WI on an electronic benefits transfer (EBT) system. Very proficient in all Microsoft Office products. Worked extensively with MFC and plug-in architecture while doing senior design project for NVIDIA which involved emulating VBIOS of NVIDIA cards both locally and over a network.
